text: Randy Wolters (born 6 April 1990) is a Dutch professional footballer who plays as a winger for Greek Super League 2 club Xanthi. ==Career== Wolters was born in Leiden. He formerly played for FC Utrecht, FC Emmen, FC Den Bosch, VVV- Venlo and Go Ahead Eagles. He made his debut for FC Utrecht in a 1–4 home defeat against VVV-Venlo and scored the only Utrecht goal. He was the first of three Utrecht players who, in a few months time, would score in their debut match (Rafael Uiterloo and Nick de Jong were the other two).
